channel.title: Comments on: Spider Dreams
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monixca
item.dc:creator: monixca
item.description: I'm soooo arachnaphobic! Every time I squish a spider, I think about being in some 1950s sci-fi flick and turning around to see the 100 foot momma spider raisng a leg to squish me:) Funny how the mind works, no?
item.content:encoded: I’m soooo arachnaphobic! Every time I squish a spider, I think about being in some 1950s sci-fi flick and turning around to see the 100 foot momma spider raisng a leg to squish me:) Funny how the mind works, no?
